room_title: Escape room "The Parlor" by Escape 20/20 in Lansing
room_description:
You are a newspaper reporter assigned to a cover a suspicious incident at a local estate. Just as you are knocking on the front door, you hear a blood-curdling scream from within the home. You quickly shove the door open and rush inside.
You are transported back in time and realize this home hasn't been touched since it was built in 1891.  Something is terribly wrong and now you are trapped. Complete the puzzles within the room to figure out a way to escape or suffer the wrath of the spirits you have angered.
